mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_recommend_info ( job_id, job_name, referee_name, referee_phone, referee_mail, recommended_name, recommended_phone, recommended_mail, status, valid, create_time ) VALUES ( #{jobId}, #{jobName}, #{refereeName}, #{refereePhone}, #{refereeMail}, #{recommendedName}, #{recommendedPhone}, #{recommendedMail}, #{status}, #{valid}, #{createTime} );
